channel.title: Dancing Knights Mix-up

item.title: Dancing Knights Mix-up
item.dc:creator: @yppman yppman
item.description:
@yppman wrote:

This code is easier to read and is less messy.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 660)     /////DANCING KNIGHTS!!!
	{
	if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) 
		{
		npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to rawrScape!";	
		npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
		npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
		}
	}
					
					
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1056)     ///////MIME!!!
	{
	if (misc.random2(25) <= 20) 
		{
		if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("6th Wizard")) {	
		npcs[i].textUpdate = "Administrator 6th Wizard is ONLINE";
		}
		else {						
		npcs[i].textUpdate = "Administrator 6th Wizard is OFFLINE";
		}
		npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
		npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
		}
	}

Read full topic

item.title: Dancing Knights Mix-up
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

yppman:

I said change the npcid in the first part of the code to a 1056. Its makin knights say the admin part but the welcome to rawrscape is set to 660. You want to make the knights say both right? In taht case make it a 1056.

That won’t help the least little bit.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1056) 
					{
					if (misc.random2(25) <= 20) 
						{
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						}
					}
					if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("6th Wizard"))
							{
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Administrator 6th Wizard is ONLINE";
						}
       					else 
						{
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Administrator 6th Wizard is OFFLINE";
						}
					}

it should be

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1056) 
					{
					if (misc.random2(25) <= 20) 
						{
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						
					
					if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("6th Wizard"))
							{
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Administrator 6th Wizard is ONLINE";
						}
       					else 
						{
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Administrator 6th Wizard is OFFLINE";
						}
					}

}
}

and, What is your problem with this? Nothing is wrong.

edit:

No, Delete the =

edit again:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1056) 
					{
					if (misc.random2(25) <= 20) 
						{
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						}
					}
					if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("6th Wizard"))

						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Administrator 6th Wizard is ONLINE";
						}
       					else 
						{
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Administrator 6th Wizard is OFFLINE";
						}
					}

it should be

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1056) 
					{
					if (misc.random2(25) <= 20) 
						{
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						
					
					if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("6th Wizard"))

item.title: Dancing Knights Mix-up
item.dc:creator: @rawr_app rawr app
item.description:
@rawr_app wrote:

I finished using the Dancing knights TuT and had already used afferins online/offline TuT and when i loog on the dancing knights all say: Admin is OFFLINE/ONLINE, when the knights should say welcome to rawrScape.

here’s the code im using:

[code]
if (npcs[i].npcType == 660) /////DANCING KNIGHTS!!!
{
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3)
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Welcome to rawrScape!”;
}
}

				if (npcs[i].npcType == 1056)     ///////MIME!!!
				{
				if (misc.random2(25) <= 20) 
					{
					npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
					npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
					}
				}
				if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("6th Wizard"))
						{
					npcs[i].textUpdate = "Administrator 6th Wizard is ONLINE";
					}
   					else 
					{
					npcs[i].textUpdate = "Administrator 6th Wizard is OFFLINE";
					}
				}
					
	[/code]

Read full topic
